document.full_text: five u.s. service members were killed in a rocket attack in iraq on monday in the worst single toll for american troops in the country in at least two years, the u.s. military and iraqi security officials said.
document.title: five u.s. troops killed in iraq attack
lines_and_colors: five u.s. service members were killed in a rocket attack in iraq on monday in the worst single toll for american troops in the country in at least two years, the u.s. military and iraqi security officials said.
